original_title: Vie et mort de l’illustre Grigori Efimovitch Raspoutine
overview: In the early twentieth century, a wandering monk arrives at the court of the last Tsar of Russia: Rasputin. Neglected and lustful, the mujik is nevertheless introduced into the inner circle of the imperial family. Which is not to the taste of some aristocrats...

production_companies.name: Ecole nationale supérieure des Arts Décoratifs

title: Life and Death of the Illustrious Rasputin
